name: Abstruse
description:
Tokyo has suddenly been engulfed in death, destruction and disease all thanks to the unforeseen invasion of the Diabolical Foxes and the Corrupted creatures they have created.

By playing as one of four heavenly-selected Disciples, you’ll use your connection to the Abstruse to wield the unimaginable powers and weapons you’ll need to push through the ever-growing horde of the Corrupted and put an end to this chaos.

YOU’RE NOT ALONE

A messenger from the heavens has descended to aid you on your treacherous journey, and are willing to use their godly powers to enhance your abilities. For a more human touch, you can always rely on another Disciple to hold your hand.

IMPACTFUL DECISIONS

You must be careful when traversing Japan, the route you take will decide how smooth your future challenges will be.

DIVERSE ACTION

With the vast number of different abilities and customisable weapons to choose from, you will always find new ways to defeat the Corrupted.

BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY

Thanks to the ever-changing world and a Game Director that is influenced by your actions, every journey will be exciting and surprising.

Demos

We would love to hear your feedback, suggestions and questions from playing any of our demos. You can use the community section below, @VixentailGames on Twitter, or use our Discord to give feedback.

Combat Test 1

19/02/2022

The purpose of this demo is to test and give feedback on the combat and movement of the character. It can also be used to test the online services of the game.

We would appreciate anything you can come up with so our future demos can be better.

Staying up to date

We recommend you to follow our Twitter @VixentailGames if you want to stay up to date with Abstruse.

We also post a more detailed monthly blog post/dev log on our website.
